data.text: «Wɛlɛ nà-botiɠɛ nui ʋa, gè yeezeiɗai bu,
É la kpee loa, goo ɠaa la ɓainga,
É la seeli kpaku ɠalea ga, nii golowoloai,
Zeezu la ɓɔlɔa, iɲɔ ge la leʋea,
GALA, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠa,
«Nà, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gè è lolini nà-faazeikpasu ʋagɔi ʋɔ.
ga gaazuɠole nuiti gaazuʋɛ zeɠe ma,
«Nà ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, dàaseigi ɠana.
Faa mɔungiti ti ɓega ga ɠɛ,
À guye niinɛi loo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ.
Teʋebai ta teʋebai zu laaiti,
Ti lɛbiyai ve Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɠula eɠɛ kɔɔɠuluɓai,
«Kaite suɠooza, gè maaɠɛni kpɔ,
Nà gize wolaiti ta gize goiti fazasu,
Nà zobo fe gaazuɠole nuiti bɛ,
Nui niiti ti ɠalivaazu kɔɔɠɔ ganigiti ma,
«Goizuɓɔlɔ nuiti, à woilo!
Ɓɛ ɠa gaazuɠoleni, nà-botiɠɛ nui laade ɓaa?
È ani mɔinmɔin kaa,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI vaani bu, ná-telebodai maaʋele ma,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, wɛlɛ nuɓusɛiti ba,
Wo zaama, ɓɛ ɠa é woilosu niima vaiti ma?
Ɓɛ ɠa é Izilayɛle ʋɔdini, Zakɔɓe mavofodai,
Naa ɠa é kɛɛni, Maliɠii ná-ziiɠaawanai zeelini ná-nuɓusɛiti ma,
